caption:
This photograph features a serene lakeside scene with several elements of interest. The image captures an array of covered boat slips, where multiple boats are docked under protective roofs with stripe-patterned awnings. The boat slips are arranged in a row, extending into the lake, creating an organized aquatic garage-like environment.

In the foreground, to the right of the slips, there's a parking lot adjacent to the lake, mostly empty but hosting a few cars and trailers suggesting some visitors or boat owners might be around. Next to the parking area, on the lake, are larger boats, including a houseboat anchored close to the shore and another couple of boats that seem ready for leisure activities.

The surrounding environment contributes a natural serene beauty to the setting, with tree-covered hills encircling the lake, providing a lush green backdrop. Also visible, to the far right across the lake, is a sandy beach area beside which further boat storage facilities can be seen, possibly indicating this as a popular spot for boating and lake activities.

Overall, the photograph depicts a tranquil, recreational lakeside setting, likely intended for boating enthusiasts and visitors appreciating the calm and beauty of a natural landscape. The scene is relaxed, with no visible humans, emphasizing the peacefulness of the environment.
title: On Route 5 marina, west of the bridge across the Niangua arm of the Lake of the Ozarks
placename: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park (Mo.)
location: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park, Missouri
